INSTRUCTIONS: 3. Set enabled: true for providers you want to test
SECURITY_NOTE: ‚ö†Ô∏è  Never commit test-config.json to git - it contains your API keys!

openrouter.notes: Universal gateway to 400+ models. Get key from: https://openrouter.ai/keys

openai.notes: Direct OpenAI API. Get key from: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys

gemini.notes: Google AI Studio key (no sk- prefix). Get key from: https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey

anthropic.notes: Anthropic Claude API. Get key from: https://console.anthropic.com/settings/keys

qwen_direct.notes: Direct Qwen API. Sign up at: https://dashscope.aliyun.com/

ollama.notes: Local Ollama server. Install from: https://ollama.ai/. No API key needed.

lmstudio.notes: Local LM Studio server. Download from: https://lmstudio.ai/. Usually no API key needed.

test_settings.test_prompt: Hello! Please respond with exactly: 'QwenCode multi-provider test successful' and nothing else.
